profile.title: My Profile

installment.title: Installment Plan
installment.chooseOption: Choose a flexible payment option that works for your budget
installment.spreadCost: Spread the cost over several months
installment.howWorkDesc: Our installment plans allow you to spread the cost of your purchase over several months with fixed monthly payments. You get immediate access to your course while paying over time.
installment.interestFaq: Is there interest on installment plans?
installment.interestFaqDesc: Some plans may include a small interest fee. We offer 3-month plans with no interest, while longer-term plans may include a nominal interest rate to cover processing costs.
installment.changePlan: Can I change my payment plan later?
installment.changePlanDesc: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your payment plan at any time through your account settings. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.
installment.missPayment: What happens if I miss a payment?
installment.missPaymentDesc: We'll send you a reminder before your payment is due. If a payment is missed, we'll work with you to get back on track. Access to course materials will continue during this period.

reservation.title: Course Reservation
reservation.description: Reserve your spot in this upcoming course. You'll receive a confirmation email with details about the course start date and access information.
reservation.whatsappConfirmation: Your spot has been reserved! For any questions or changes, please contact us on WhatsApp at 0703 15 33 55
reservation.paymentDue: Payment is due 7 days before the course starts
reservation.reminder: You'll receive a reminder 3 days before the course
reservation.materials: Course materials will be sent 24 hours before start
reservation.lateArrivals: Late arrivals may miss important introductions

map.mapDescription: Select a location to view it on 2GIS map
map.note: Click the button below to open the map in a new tab
map.searchPlaceholder: Search by city, address, or ZIP code
map.testCentersDesc: Our test centers offer proctored exams for certification courses. All locations with "Test Center" service offer this feature.
map.certificationExamsDesc: Take official certification exams in a proctored environment
map.practiceTestsDesc: Access practice tests and study materials on-site
map.technicalSupportDesc: Get help with technical issues during your exam

footer.description: MindStore is your premier destination for premium digital learning products from industry experts.

course1.title: Advanced React Development
course1.description: Master advanced React concepts including hooks, context, and performance optimization.

course2.title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
course2.description: Learn the principles of user interface and user experience design.

course3.title: Python for Data Science
course3.description: Comprehensive guide to using Python for data analysis and visualization.

course4.title: Spanish for Beginners
course4.description: Start your Spanish journey with foundational vocabulary and grammar.

course5.title: Digital Marketing Mastery
course5.description: Complete guide to modern digital marketing strategies and tools.

course6.title: Mobile App Development
course6.description: Build cross-platform mobile apps with React Native.

book1.title: React Patterns and Best Practices
book1.author: John Smith
book1.description: A comprehensive guide to React development patterns and industry best practices.

book2.title: Design Systems Handbook
book2.author: Elena Rodriguez
book2.description: Learn how to create and maintain effective design systems for digital products.

book3.title: Python Data Analysis Cookbook
book3.author: Michael Chen
book3.description: Practical recipes for data analysis and visualization using Python libraries.

book4.title: Language Learning Strategies
book4.author: Sophie Dubois
book4.description: Evidence-based techniques for effective language acquisition and retention.

book5.title: Digital Marketing Strategy
book5.author: Robert Johnson
book5.description: Modern approaches to building and executing digital marketing campaigns.

book6.title: Mobile UI Design Principles
book6.author: Emma Wilson
book6.description: Essential principles for creating intuitive and engaging mobile user interfaces.

lecture1.title: Advanced JavaScript Concepts

lecture1.description: Deep dive into advanced JavaScript concepts including closures, prototypes, and async patterns.

lecture2.title: UI/UX Design Trends 2025
lecture2.speaker: Sarah Williams

lecture3.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals

lecture3.description: Introduction to machine learning algorithms and practical applications in real-world scenarios.

lecture4.title: French Conversation Mastery
lecture4.speaker: Marie Dubois
lecture4.description: Improve your French conversation skills with practical dialogues and pronunciation tips.

lecture5.title: Blockchain for Business
lecture5.speaker: Robert Thompson
lecture5.description: Understanding blockchain technology and its applications in modern business environments.

lecture6.title: Mobile App Design Workshop
lecture6.speaker: Emma Wilson
lecture6.description: Hands-on workshop for designing intuitive and engaging mobile application interfaces.

podcast1.description: Weekly discussions on the latest technology trends, programming tips, and industry insights.
